stripped_text: click: Place 1 power counter on this asset. When the Runner's next turn begins, they lose click. Use this ability only once per turn. click, trash, 3 hosted power counters: Gain click click click click.
text: [click]: Place 1 power counter on this asset. When the Runner's next turn begins, they lose [click]. Use this ability only once per turn. [click],[trash], 3 hosted power counters: Gain [click][click][click][click].
title: MCA Austerity Policy
